title: Landing page displays 27 pieces of content
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page
custom_steps: When viewing the content on the page
custom_expected:
Then the Landing page displays 27 pieces of content. Organized by 3 groups of 8 articles with a larger article going across the screen that separates the 3 groups. 
The 8 articles are are displayed as follows: 3 on top 2 in the middle with an ad on the far left followed by 3 on the bottom

title: "Load More" button is available at the bottom of the page
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page
custom_steps: When the user is at the bottom of the page
custom_expected: Then the "Load More" button is available at the bottom of the page

title: On the landing page the entire article card will link user to Article page
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page
custom_steps: When viewing the article card
custom_expected: Then  the entire article card will link user to Article page

title: Article cards feature the correct content
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page
custom_steps: When viewing the article cards
custom_expected:
Then Article cards will feature the following:
16:9 cut photos
Article headline
Author name
Timestamp pinned at the bottom

title: DNU: Timestamps are displayed with the same format as MLB News (Currently does not exist)
custom_preconds: Give user is viewing a Cut4 article
custom_steps: When viewing the timestamp
custom_expected: Then the timestamp is formatted as 1 minute/hour/day/week/month ago

title: DNU: If articles are more than a month old then no timestamp should display
custom_preconds: Given user is on the Landing and Topic pages
custom_steps: when the article is over a month old
custom_expected: Then the article will not display a timestamp

title: DNU: Display date and time on article pages no matter how old the article is
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 article page
custom_steps: When the article is over a month old
custom_expected:
Then Display date and time on article pages no matter how old the article is. 

Ex: Posted on October 12, 2017 at 11:22am

title: Article Pages primary tag is featured at the top of the article
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the top of the article
custom_expected: Then the Article Pages primary tag is featured at the top of the article

title: On Article pages the related tags are displayed at the bottom of each article
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the bottom of the article
custom_expected: Then the related tags are displayed at the bottom of each article

title: On the Article page when clicking on related tags the user is taken to the Topic page of that tag
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When clicking on related tags
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Topic page of that tag

title: Article Page tags should be categorized together
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the Tags in the article
custom_expected:
Then Tags should be categorized together by the following:
Teams in this article:
Players in this article:
Topics in this article:

title: Right Rail will feature one "Up Next" article (First article on Landing Page)
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the right rail
custom_expected: Then Right Rail will feature one "Up Next" article (First article on Landing Page)

title: DNU: Right Rail will feature 3 editorially selected articles added to the article HB file (currently in place)
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the Right Rail
custom_expected: Then Right Rail will feature 3 editorially selected articles added to the article HB file (currently in place)

title: Below article: 9 pieces of content from different tags will show
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When the user is viewing below the article
custom_expected:
9 pieces of content from different tags: EDIT : Some articles Have 2 items from primary tag
3 items from article's primary tag (some articles have 2) 
3 items from featured module on Landing Page (Featured Content, Blog, etc)
Next 4 items from Landing Page (#2-5)

title: Display a column in the right rail of Article Pages
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the right side of the page
custom_expected: Then display a column in the right rail of Article Pages

title: DNU: Right Rail is not scrollable
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the right rail
custom_expected: Then the Right Rail is not scrollable

title: Sponsored tags will always be hidden
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the article tags
custom_expected: Then Sponsored tags will always be hidden

title: Tag types should be grouped together
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the articles tags
custom_expected:
Then Tag types should be grouped together
EX: Team tags, Player tags, Topic tags

title: There is no limit of tags displayed on an article
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the articles tags
custom_expected: Then there is no limit of tags displayed on an article

title: Each article will have 1 primary tag, the rest will be considered secondary tags
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When viewing the articles tags
custom_expected: Then each article will have 1 primary tag, the rest will be considered secondary tags

title: Each Cut4 tag will be its own topic page
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 page
custom_steps: When viewing the Cut4 tag
custom_expected: Then each Cut4 tag will be its own topic page

title: Topic pages feature all articles with the same tags
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the articles in the topic page
custom_expected: Then Topic pages feature all articles with the same tags

title: DNU: Topic Pages will feature a row of "Latest content"
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the Latest Content row
custom_expected: Then row is pulling in the first 3 items on the Cut4 Landing Page

title: DNU: The same disclaimer note should appear at the bottom of every Cut4 article
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Article page
custom_steps: When at the bottom of the page
custom_expected: Then the following disclaimer note should appear at the bottom of every Cut4 article: “This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.”

title: Treat each author as its own article tag/topic
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the articles author
custom_expected: Then Treat each author as its own article tag/topic

title: Clicking an author tag in the byline of an article will take user to that author's topic page
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When clicking on the authors tag
custom_expected: Then user is taken to that author's topic page

title: Treat each team has its own article Topic
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 Team Page
custom_expected: Then Treat each team as its own article Topic

title: Thumbnails images display properly
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the items on the page
custom_expected: Then a thumbnail image is played for each item

title: Headline displays the title of the article
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the items on the page
custom_expected: Then each item displays an article headline

title: Bylines display showing user the contributor who wrote the article
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the items on the page
custom_expected: Then Bylines display showing user the contributor who wrote the article

title: Contributor information displays first name and last name of the writer
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing an articles Contributor information
custom_expected: Then contributor information displays first name and last name of the writer

title: If multiple contributor cards present, separate bylines (first name last name) with "and"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When multiple contributor cards present
custom_expected: Then separate bylines (first name last name) with "and"

title: DNU: Timestamps display on topic pages
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing an item on the page
custom_expected: Then Timestamps display

title: DNU: Timestamp logic is maintained
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing article timestamps
custom_expected: Then Timestamp logic is maintained: 10 minutes ago, 1 hour ago, 12:30 AM EDT, Sep. 30th, 2018

title: DNU: All timestamps display in ET
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing article timestamps
custom_expected: Then All timestamps display in ET

title: Primary Media on the topic pages follow contains criteria
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing Primary Media
custom_expected:
Then Primary Media displays in accordance to: 
Article title: headline (If headline is not populated, take from title)
Thumbnail: thumbnail
Byline
Timestamp contentDate

title: On initial load Cut4 Topic Pages (including the Landing Page) loads 21 items
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When loading the page
custom_expected: Then page initially loads 21 items

title: Below the first 18 items will be a "Load More" button
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing the bottom of the page below the initial 18 items
custom_expected: Then there will be a "Load More" button

title: "Load More" will load at most another 21 items, in the same styling
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut4 Topic page
custom_steps: When clicking the load more button
custom_expected: Then "Load More" will load at most another 21 items, in the same styling

title: "Load More" button will be present on the Cut4 Landing Page, Topic Pages and all Article Pages
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Cut4 Landing Page, Topic Pages and all Article Pages
custom_steps: When at the bottom of the page
custom_expected: Then there is a Load More button

title: "Load More" button will return 9 more pieces of content (3 rows of 3 articles)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Cut4 Landing Page, Topic Pages and all Article Pages
custom_steps: When at the bottom of the page and clicking the Load More button
custom_expected: Then "Load More" button will return 9 more pieces of content (3 rows of 3 articles), 3 rows of 2 articles, and 3 rows with 1 article totaling 18

title: "Load More" will continue to return more content until there is no more to return
custom_preconds: When the user is on the Cut4 Landing Page, Topic Pages and all Article Pages
custom_steps: When pressing the Load More button
custom_expected: Then "Load More" will continue to return more content until there is no more to return

title: DNU: When using "Load More" button the URL will change to indicate user has reached additional pages
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Cut4 Landing Page, Topic Pages and all Article Pages
custom_steps: When using the "Load More" button
custom_expected: Then the URL will change to indicate user has reached additional pages

title: Cut4 Header will allow users to navigate back to MLB.com
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Cut 4 page
custom_steps: When navigating the Cut4 Header
custom_expected: Then the Cut4 Header will allow users to navigate back to MLB.com

title: Cut4 categories being promoted in the header match the config
custom_preconds: Given user is on a Cut4 page
custom_steps: When navigating the header
custom_expected: Then Cut4 categories being promoted in the header match the config

title: Team icons will be featured on article thumbnails on the landing page and topic pags
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Cut4 Landing page/ Topic pages
custom_steps: When viewing team featured articles
custom_expected: Then team icons will be featured on article thumbnails

title: Clicking team icons on an article thumbnail will take user into the article (not team page)
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page/Topic page
custom_steps: When clicking team icons on an article thumbnail
custom_expected: Then the user is taken into the article (not the team page)

title: If article has 1 team tag, that team icon will be displayed
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page/Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing an article with 1 team tag
custom_expected: Then that team icon will be displayed

title: If an article has 0 team tags, no team icon will be displayed
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page/Topic page
custom_steps: When an article has 0 team tags
custom_expected: Then no team icon will be displayed

title: If article has more than 1 team tag, a generic MLB icon will be displayed
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page/Topic page
custom_steps: When viewing an article that has more than 1 team tag
custom_expected: Then a generic MLB icon will be displayed

title: Ensure that no article displays more than once on the Landing Page, Topic Page or Article Page between the original content, "Related" content or content from a secondary tag
custom_preconds: Give user is on the Cut4 landing page/Topic page/ Article page
custom_expected: Then ensure that no article displays more than once

title: DNU: Livefyre is implemented for commenting
custom_preconds: Give user is on a Cut4 article page
custom_steps: When trying to comment
custom_expected: Then Livefyre is implemented for commenting
